Title: Phases out certain mandatory university fees for graduate students
Summary: Provides that beginning in the 2026-2027 academic year, certain graduate students shall be required to pay 25% of all current and future mandatory university fees; provides that in the 2027-2028 academic year and thereafter, no mandatory university fees shall be charged, with the exclusion of the graduate student association student activity fee.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to phasing out certain mandatory university fees for graduate students
